# Memory Management

**API Collection**

Retain and release sparse objects.

## Resource Retention

- **SparseRetain(_:)**: Increases the reference count on a symbolic factorization object.
- **SparseRetain(_:)**: Increases the reference count on a double-precision numeric factorization object.
- **SparseRetain(_:)**: Increases the reference count on a single-precision numeric factorization object.
- **SparseRetain(_:)**: Increases the reference count on a double-precision subfactor object.
- **SparseRetain(_:)**: Increases the reference count on a single-precision subfactor object.
- **SparseRetain(_:)**: Increase reference count on a numeric factorization object, returning a copy.
- **SparseRetain(_:)**: Increase reference count on a numeric factorization object, returning a copy.
- **SparseRetain(_:)**: Increase reference count on a numeric factorization object, returning a copy.
- **SparseRetain(_:)**: Increase reference count on a numeric factorization object, returning a copy.

## Resource Cleanup

- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Releases a matrix of double-precision values’ references to any memory that the Sparse Solvers library allocates.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Releases a matrix of single-precision values’ references to any memory that the Sparse Solvers library allocates.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Releases a factorization of a matrix of double-precision values’ references to any memory that the Sparse Solvers library allocates.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Releases a factorization of a matrix of single-precision values’ references to any memory that the Sparse Solvers library allocates.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Releases a matrix factorization’s references to any memory that the Sparse Solvers library allocates.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Releases a double-precision subfactor object’s references to any memory that the Sparse Solvers library allocates.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Releases a single-precision subfactor object’s references to any memory that the Sparse Solvers library allocates.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Releases a double-precision preconditioner’s references to any memory that the Sparse Solvers library allocates.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Releases a single-precision preconditioner’s references to any memory that the Sparse Solvers library allocates.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Release a Sparse Preconditioner’s references to any memory allocated by the sparse library.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Release a Sparse Object’s references to any memory allocated by the sparse library.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Release a Sparse matrix’s references to any memory allocated by the Sparse library.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Release a Sparse matrix’s references to any memory allocated by the Sparse library.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Release a Sparse Object’s references to any memory allocated by the sparse library.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Release a Sparse matrix’s references to any memory allocated by the Sparse library.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Release a Sparse Preconditioner’s references to any memory allocated by the sparse library.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Release a Sparse Object’s references to any memory allocated by the sparse library.
- **SparseCleanup(_:)**: Release a Sparse Object’s references to any memory allocated by the sparse library.
